main_sections.hero_intro: My name is Gyula Vasvári, creator of SØNNSTA windows. SØNNSTA is a special indoor window that evokes the sight and effect of natural sunlight in places where a real light source is not available. The aim of the development was to create an experience that not only provides light, but also visual depth perspective: the innovative technical solution built into the product creates the effect of a spacious, sun-drenched space, thus creating maximum illusion.
main_sections.hero_uniqueness: This is what makes the handmade, custom-made SØNNSTA truly unique – the light not only illuminates, but also
main_sections.hero_patent: The SØNNSTA window is now a patented innovation that redefines interior lighting in homes, offices and professional environments.
main_sections.story_title: The story that turned into light
main_sections.story_intro: My name is Gyula Vasvári, creator of SØNNSTA windows. The idea for SØNNSTA started in a windowless basement room. A space where the lack of natural light was felt every day – and where the need arose for a window that isn't really there, yet seems completely real.
main_sections.story_development: This inner motivation sparked years of development and experimentation. The goal was not simply to create a lamp, but to create a visual experience that would reflect sunlight not only as light, but also as mood and space.
main_sections.story_essence: This is the essence of SØNNSTA: the structure, which is only a few centimeters thick, still appears to have depth, as if we were looking at the outside world through a real window. It is this combination of visual perspective and authentic sunlight effect that makes the product so special.
main_sections.story_today: Today, SØNNSTA is not just an idea born out of personal need, but a patented innovation that can open up new perspectives anywhere. Custom-made and handcrafted, SØNNSTA windows provide the same experience in homes, offices, community or professional spaces: sunlight where it was previously impossible.

S.name: SØNNSTA S
S.subtitle: Single-module window – the most compact SØNNSTA experience
list_preview_bullets: Single-module system – ideal for smaller spaces, hallways, bathrooms, or work areas
Real sunlight color temperature and light dynamics
Easy installation: 12V power supply, wall-mountable design
S.title: Single-module window
S.description: SØNNSTA S is the most compact model, capable of conjuring natural sunlight with a single module. It is the ideal choice for smaller spaces – hallways, bathrooms, or work areas – where there are no real windows but light and an inspiring spatial experience are still needed.
key_features: Natural sunlight effect indoors – the character of the light evokes the experience of real sunlight.
Power consumption: 20 watts – low energy requirements.
Adjustable brightness – dimming can be controlled manually or via smartphone.
Easy installation – 12 V power supply, wall-mountable design.
technical_data: Color temperature: in the range of natural sunlight
warranty: English language customer service and support

M.title: SØNNSTA M
M.description: SØNNSTA M is the most popular model: its two modules offer the perfect balance between compact size and spectacular sunlight effect. Ideal for living rooms, bedrooms, and offices, where it can make the space feel more spacious and brighter.
key_features: Natural sunlight effect indoors – realistic light and visual space experience.
Two-module system – more spectacular, powerful lighting effect, for medium-sized spaces.
Adjustable brightness – dimming can be controlled manually or via smartphone.
Easy installation – 12 V power supply, wall-mountable design.
technical_data: Color temperature: in the range of natural sunlight
warranty: English language customer service and support

L.title: SØNNSTA L
L.description: SØNNSTA L is the largest model, offering an impressive sunlight experience with its four-module design. It is the ideal addition to larger interior spaces, hospitality venues, wellness centers, or exclusive interiors.
key_features: Natural sunlight effect indoors – large, realistic lighting experience.
Four-module system – powerful lighting effect for larger spaces.
Power consumption: 80 watts – efficient energy use.
Adjustable brightness – dimming can be controlled manually or via smartphone.
Easy installation – 12 V power supply, wall-mountable design.
technical_data: Color temperature: in the range of natural sunlight
warranty: English language customer service and support
